page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content: AS IN MANY OTHER AREAS OF BRITAIN,THE PEOPLE OF THE NORTHWICH BLOCK ARE TAKING GREATER CARE OF THEMSELVES AND GIVING PERSONAL HEALTH AN IMPORTANT PLACE IN THEIR DAY-TO-DAY LIVES. THIS IS REFLECTED IN THE NUMBER OF GROUPS WHO RUN COURSES IN KEEP-FIT AND AEROBICS FOR THEMSELVES AND OTHERS.IN THE LAST TWO YEARS TWO PURPOSE-BUILT HEALTH CLUBS HAVE OPENED.THEY ARE "NORTHWICH HEALTH AND LEISURE" AND "INTRIM"AND BOTH PROVIDE THEIR MEMBERS WITH FACILITIES TO IMPROVE FITNESS. THERE ARE MANY JOGGERS TO BE SEEN IN THE AREA ESPECIALLY AROUND OCTOBER WHEN THE NORTHWICH HALF-MARATHON TAKES PLACE.IN 1985 THE PROCEEDS ARE TO GO TO"LIVE AID",THE ETHIOPIAN DISASTER FUND.IN OUR OWN SURVEY THE IMPORTANCE OF HEALTH IS SHOWN BY THE FACT THAT 54% OF FORMER CIGARETTE SMOKERS HAVE GIVEN UP IN THE LAST FIVE YEARS.
